The table below includes a list of all database tables currently available in Vision8 (production, test, sandbox), Financial Data Warehouse (fdw), and IAS.

Use the search functionality to look for a specific type of table (e.g. "parcel_extension") or filter by database or schema to explore what tables exist in each resources.

```{r, include=FALSE}
library(dplyr)
library(readr)
library(DT)

table_data <- readr::read_csv("data_dictionary_table_data.csv") %>% 
    select(DATABASE, DATABASE_NAME, SCHEMA, NAME, TYPE)
```

```{r}
#| echo: false
#| warning: false

DT::datatable(table_data, escape = FALSE, filter = 'top', rownames = FALSE,
              #options = list(pageLength = 100, lengthMenu = list(list(100, 250, 500, -1), list(100, 250, 500, 'All')))
              options = list(paging = FALSE, scrollCollapse = TRUE)
              )
```
